credentials.//: Leave this empty for SaaS Tenants
For Managed Tenants use the first part of the Tenant Web URL (e.g. https://yoj211.managed-sprint.dynalabs.io/e for https://yoj211.managed-sprint.dynalabs.io/e/ecc29184-1ae2-46dd-96fe-06997671fc57)
For SaaS Tenants this is the first part of your Tenant URL (e.g. siz65484 for https://siz65484.live.dynatrace.com)
For Managed Tenants this is the last part of the Tenant URL (e.g. ecc29184-1ae2-46dd-96fe-06997671fc57 for https://yoj211.managed-sprint.dynalabs.io/e/ecc29184-1ae2-46dd-96fe-06997671fc57)
